actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend section 511 of the Career Compensation Act of 1949, as amended, to equalize the retired pay of certain officers of the uniformed services retired prior to October 1, 1949, under the same law and with the same service, as those retired after September 30, 1949, but prior to June 1, 1958.

summary.text: Amends the Career Compensation Act of 1949 to equalize the retired pay of specified officers of the various military departments who retired prior to October 1, 1949, under specified legislation and officers who retired, under the same Acts and with the same service, after September 30, 1949 and before June 1, 1958.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 511 of the Career Compensation Act of 1949, as amended, to equalize the retired pay of certain officers of the uniformed services retired prior to October 1, 1949, under the same law and with the same service, as those retired after September 30, 1949, but prior to June 1, 1958.
